name: WoWSystemSmartHomes
0:
”Alexa, open wow system”
”Alexa, open wow system and turn on kitchen lights”
”Alexa, open wow system and turn on garage lights”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wow system
Developer Terms of Use
des: Alexa skill for home automation projects with WOW Smart Homes systems. To link the WOW system account with the skill simply add the email from the client's amazon account to the WOW system
